description: Trump meets with his national security team, including Sessions and Papadopoulos. The latter says he could arrange a meeting with Putin.
Trump meets with his natl security team, including Sessions and Papadopolous. The latter says he could arrange a meeting w/ Putin.
Russians create fake email account and use it to target more than 30 Clinton campaign staffers, according to indictment.
Papadopoulos and his female Russian contact exchange emails about setting up a potential Russia trip.
Russians hack into the DNC computer network via the DCCC network, according to indictment.
The "professor" introduces Papadopoulos to a person said to be connected to the Russian foreign ministry.
Russian goverment hackers register the website domain "DCLeaks," according to indictment.
Russian hackers prompt malware placed on DCCC computers to start taking directions from the hackers, according to indictment.
Russian hackers steal gigabytes of DNC data, moving it to a computer they leased in Illinois, according to indictment.
Papadopoulos and his foreign ministry contact exchange more emails.
Papadopoulos emails a senior campaign advisor indicating the Russians are ready to meet with Trump.
The "professor" tells Trump advisor Papadopoulos that Russians have "thousands" of Hillary Clinton emails.
The "professor" tells Papadopoulos that Russians have "thousands" of Hillary Clinton emails.
Trump meets Russian ambassador Sergey Kislyak.
headline: Donald Trump met Russian ambassador Sergey Kislyak during election campaign
